slide1.title: About Us
slide1.description: The company is engaged in activities related to the purchase, sale, and leasing of computer and electronic systems, software development, hardware equipment procurement and system analysis, project management and consulting, computer and software training, network communication services and training, information and communication consulting, and brokerage services. It also deals with movable and immovable property transactions, collateral and mortgage registration, protection of receivables and debts, guarantees and warranties, securities transactions, acquisition and transfer of intellectual property rights, obtaining domestic and foreign credits, establishment and exit from partnerships, acquisition of vehicles and equipment, import and export, establishment of representatives and agents, participation in tenders and auctions, participation in exhibitions, and development of promotional and public relations activities and publications.

sections.title: FinTech and Services
sections.introduction: In the field of financial technology, we specialize in innovation and service; we develop innovative software for finance, virtual POS, and more; our technical applications and core technologies include media streaming, mobile services, and cryptocurrency assets; our comprehensive services encompass asset transactions, innovative construction, warranty support, financial transaction planning, and business innovation.

items.title: Software Development
items.content: We develop custom software for various financial services, banking software, international money transfer software, virtual POS systems, collection systems, payment systems, stock and finance software, and educational software for finance, as well as streaming services, mobile services, cryptocurrency and crypto asset projects, blockchain projects, and project-specific software.

items.title: Guarantees and Collateral
items.content: To achieve the company's objectives and purposes, we can engage in activities related to the acquisition, purchase, sale, leasing through ordinary lease and financial leasing, and all kinds of management of movable and immovable properties, as well as construction, facilities, and similar construction on the real estates we own or lease, whether directly or through third parties.

items.title: Management of Movable and Immovable Property
items.content: The company can establish security interests and mortgages on its movable and immovable properties in favor of the company or third parties. For this purpose, it can register and record these properties with security and mortgages.

items.title: Collateral and Mortgage Registration
items.content: The company can provide and receive all kinds, forms, and types of mortgages and liens to secure its receivables and debts. It can register, transfer, and assign these mortgages and liens and modify and amend existing and future mortgages and liens.

items.title: Protection of Receivables and Debts
items.content: The company can provide guarantees, sureties, and warranties for itself and third parties or undertake obligations as a joint and several guarantor in favor of others.

items.title: Protection of Receivables and Debts
items.content: As long as it does not engage in securities brokerage activities, the company can buy, sell, provide collateral for, establish rights of usufruct, and engage in all kinds of commercial, industrial, and financial transactions related to securities such as stocks, bonds, dividend certificates, profit-sharing certificates, and carry out any kind of transactions related to securities.

sections.title: Import, Export, and International Trade
sections.introduction: We carry out domestic and international trade activities, import, export, and leasing operations.

items.title: Trade Activities
items.content: We can participate in domestic and international trade activities, including import and export.

items.title: Purchase, Import, and Export of Vehicles and Equipment
items.content: The company can acquire, purchase, lease, and import or export all kinds of vehicles, equipment, machinery, installations, electrical or electronic devices, hardware, software, codes, and similar products for use in technological environments and make sales and leasing of such products.

sections.title: Credit Operations
sections.introduction: We can provide short-term, medium-term, and long-term domestic and foreign credits.

items.title: Trade Activities
items.content: We can obtain and use short, medium, and long-term domestic and foreign credits from Turkish and foreign banks or other financial institutions.

sections.title: Software Development
sections.introduction: We focus on computer software development, web design, and provide various software production for multimedia products, advertising, e-commerce, and computer hardware integration.

items.title: Software Development and Presentation
items.content: We produce and present all kinds of computer software, web design, multimedia products such as animation and simulation, intermediary services, advertising and promotion services, e-commerce, buying, selling, and marketing.

items.title: Software Integration, Development, and Deployment
items.content: We produce, develop, process, reproduce, and distribute all kinds of software, including software integrated into all types of computer hardware, operating systems, application software, database software, productivity-enhancing software, multimedia software, and other software, and distribute them in all kinds of physical and electronic media.

sections.title: Management and Consulting
sections.introduction: We provide software project management and consulting, development, database analysis, and related services.

items.title: Project Management and Consulting
items.content: We provide software development project management and consulting services.

items.title: Information and Communication Consulting and Brokerage Services
items.content: We provide consulting and brokerage services in information and communication.

items.title: Software Consulting and Services
items.content: We provide all kinds of software consulting, development, database consulting, project analysis, and software services.

sections.title: Other Businesses
sections.introduction: We provide computer and electronic system applications, develop and sell software and hardware equipment, organize training and conferences, and provide network communication services.

items.title: Purchase, Sale, and Leasing of Computer and Electronic Systems
items.content: We develop and provide all kinds of software, codes, and similar products for computer and electronic system acquisition and use, and make sales and leasing of such pre-produced products.

items.title: Computer and Software Training
items.content: We provide all kinds of computer and software training, organize meetings, seminars, and training activities on these topics.

items.title: Network Communication Services and Training
items.content: We provide all kinds of network communication services and training, establish and operate all kinds of infrastructure, tools, and facilities related to them, lease or rent them, and develop software for them.

items.title: Hardware Equipment Provision and System Analysis
items.content: We provide hardware and perform system analysis and design for this purpose, control applications, make changes, develop application packages, and market software.

items.title: Intellectual Property Acquisition and Transfer
items.content: We can acquire patents, licenses, privileges, trademarks, technical assistance, know-how, user rights, computer software, and other intellectual and industrial property rights from domestic or foreign sources, lease them, and transfer them.

items.title: Partnership Establishment and Exit
items.content: Both domestically and internationally, we can establish partnerships with other natural and legal persons and participate as a partner in existing companies, merge with them, if deemed necessary, separate from these partnerships, and terminate them.

items.title: Establishment of Representative Offices and Agents
items.content: Domestically and abroad, we can establish representative offices, agencies, branches, appoint agents, accept services, act as agents, commission agents, and establish other legal relationships necessary for the company's objectives.

items.title: Tender Participation and Bidding
items.content: We can participate in tenders and auctions opened both domestically and internationally, enter into bids, make bids, deposit bid bonds, undertake obligations, and enter into contracts if the tender is awarded to us.

items.title: Exhibition Participation
items.content: For the purpose of its activities, the company can participate in all kinds of fairs, exhibitions, and trade fairs.

items.title: Carry Out Publicity and Public Relations Activities
items.content: The company can carry out all types of publicity and public relations activities related to the promotion of its services or authorize third parties to do the same.

items.title: Publication Preparation
items.content: The company can prepare periodical or non-periodical printed or digital publications related to its field of activity and other activities specified in its articles of association.
